Record.ClassificationPath: Findings_and_Disorders_Kind/Disease, Disorder or Finding/Disease or Disorder/Disorder by Site/Cardiovascular Disorder/Vascular Disorder/Non-Neoplastic Vascular Disorder/Poor Vascular Access
Record.Description: A situation describing a high degree of difficultly as it relates to intravenous and/or intra-arterial access of an individual's vascular system.
